Name: Ibis package
Description: Linen package of the type assigned to the ibis. At the bottom there is a beige and brown rosette. A figure of the god Thot has been sewn, depicted with a human body and an ibis head. The ibis is the symbolic animal of Thot, whose cult center was in Hermopolis Magna, where a cemetery for these animals was located. The x ray shows long bird bones.
